topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)

name: Stani's Python Editor
short_description: SPE is a python IDE with auto indentation&completion,call tips,syntax coloring&highlighting,uml viewer,class explorer,source index,todo list,pycrust shell,file browsers,drag&drop,Blender support.Spe ships with wxGlade,PyChecker and Kiki.
